data.sentence: The word وَهُوَ comes from the root ه و and is associated with the meanings: huwa = He (pronoun. masculine 3rd. sing.)

data.meanings: Take in the mouth, clog up, obstruct (a path), stop, gobble, ate quickly, morsel/mouthful, kiss/embrace/clasp.
data.sentence: The word فَالْتَقَمَهُ comes from the root ل ق م and is associated with the meanings: Take in the mouth, clog up, obstruct (a path), stop, gobble, ate quickly, morsel/mouthful, kiss/embrace/clasp.

data.meanings: (Ha-Alif-Ta) To fly about, prowl around. Ha-Waw- Tay = (Ha-Alif-Tay) To watch, guard, protect, surround.
data.sentence: The word الْحُوتُ comes from the root ح و ت and is associated with the meanings: (Ha-Alif-Ta) To fly about, prowl around. Ha-Waw- Tay = (Ha-Alif-Tay) To watch, guard, protect, surround.
The word مُلِيمٌ comes from the root ل و م and is associated with the meanings: (lama)To blame someone for something, accuse.
